dataQuery.sqlStatement: SELECT org_name, ORG_PHY_ADDRS, ORG_ADDRS || ' , ' || ORG_ZIP || ' - ' || TWN_NAME || ' , ' || COU_NAME POSTALADDRESS, 'Telephone' || ':' || ORG_TEL1 || DECODE(ORG_TEL2, NULL, NULL, ' /' || ORG_TEL2) TELEPHONE, 'Fax' || ':' || ORG_FAX FAX, lower(ORG_EMAIL_ADDRS) EMAIL, ORG_RPT_LOGO logo, lower(ORG_WEB_ADDRS) WEB, CUR_SYMBOL CURRENCY FROM TQC_ORGANIZATIONS, TQC_COUNTRIES, TQC_TOWNS, TQC_SYSTEMS, TQC_CURRENCIES WHERE ORG_TWN_CODE = TWN_CODE AND ORG_COU_CODE = COU_CODE AND TWN_COU_CODE=COU_CODE AND SYS_ORG_CODE = ORG_CODE AND CUR_CODE = ORG_CUR_CODE AND SYS_SHT_DESC = 'LMS'

SELECT PRP_SURNAME||' '||PRP_OTHER_NAMES CLIENT, PRP_PHYSICAL_ADDR, PROD_DESC, ENDR_UW_YEAR, ENDR_OVERRIDE_FCL_AMT, NVL(SPR_CONTACT, SPR_NAME)SPR_CONTACT, SPR_PHYSICAL_ADDRESS, SPR_POSTAL_ADDRESS, SPR_NAME, SPR_PHONE, PRV_TOWN.TWN_NAME SPR_TOWN, AGN_NAME, AGN_PHYSICAL_ADDRESS, AGN_POSTAL_ADDRESS, AGENCY_TOWN.TWN_NAME AGN_TOWN, :CURRENCY CUR_SYMBOL, TO_CHAR(SYSDATE, 'ddth MonthYYYY')TODAY, :org_name ORGANIZATION FROM LMS_POLICY_ENDORSEMENTS, LMS_POLICIES, LMS_PROPOSERS, LMS_PRODUCTS, TQC_SERVICE_PROVIDERS, TQC_TOWNS PRV_TOWN, LMS_AGENCIES, TQC_TOWNS AGENCY_TOWN WHERE ENDR_CODE = :V_ENDR_CODE AND POL_PRP_CODE = PRP_CODE AND ENDR_POL_CODE = POL_CODE AND POL_PROD_CODE = PROD_CODE AND ENDR_TQ_SPR_CODE = SPR_CODE AND SPR_TWN_CODE = PRV_TOWN.TWN_CODE(+) AND ENDR_AGEN_CODE = AGN_CODE AND AGN_TWN_CODE = AGENCY_TOWN.TWN_CODE(+)
